snippet.title: METAL MAX Xeno - Fighting for Humanity (PS4)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ www.nisamerica.com/mmx

Humanity's last defenders join together under the shadow of Iron Base for a final stand that will determine the fate of the world.

Celebrating it's 25th Anniversary, Metal Max Xeno is a new chapter in the venerated series! Join Talis, a lone wanderer, as he deploys his faithful tank to take on the harsh wasteland in this RPG of post-apocolyptic proportions! Human Demise. Tank Salvation.
